definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: She walked on stage again, shaking from head to foot, and started speaking.
sentences.chinese: 她再次走上台，浑身上下抖个不停，开始说台词。

sentences.english: Every cell of her body was alive.
sentences.chinese: 她浑身上下每一个细胞都充满着活力。

sentences.english: She had aches and pains all over after the four-day trip.
sentences.chinese: 四天的旅行后她感到浑身上下十分疼痛。

sentences.english: We covered every inch of our bodies with black, sticky mud and began to laugh very hard.
sentences.chinese: 我们将浑身上下都涂上黑色的粘泥，然后开怀大笑。

sentences.english: He was in rags and had wounds all over his body.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着开洞的衣服，浑身上下都是伤。

sentences.english: The children were covered in mud from head to toe.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们浑身上下都是泥。

sentences.english: A moment later, he jumped in beside her, soaking wet.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿，他从她旁边跳上车，浑身上下湿透了。

sentences.english: Everything about her was sweet, pale, like honey .
sentences.chinese: 她浑身上下都是甜蜜蜜，软绵绵的，象蜂蜜那样。

sentences.english: His eyes shone like fire, his body was swollen with venom.
sentences.chinese: 它的双眼象火焰似的闪耀，浑身上下毒液欲滴。

sentences.english: He stared the visitor up and down.
sentences.chinese: 他把来访者浑身上下打量了一番。

sentences.english: Back at home in the evening, I was reduced to a sore flesh all over.
sentences.chinese: 晚上回到家浑身上下没有一块肌肉不酸痛。

sentences.english: But in broad-brush personality terms, the real you is probably shining through.
sentences.chinese: 但是真正的你其实浑身上下充满了闪光点。

sentences.english: My back always hurt afterwards, and I'd be full of bundles.
sentences.chinese: 我浑身上下都是背包，过后我的背部总是受伤。

sentences.english: We were filled with hope, with passion, with dreams for the future.
sentences.chinese: 我们浑身上下都是希望和激情，对未来充满了梦想。

sentences.english: He was tired out and wet through.
sentences.chinese: 他已疲惫不堪，浑身上下全已湿透。
